ROOT.GetStationList: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.ID,A.NAME AS STNAME,E.NAME,C.transformation_capacity AS CAPACITY,D.ID,D.NAME,B.ID,B.NAME_ABBREVIATION,A.OPERATE_DATE,A.LONGITUDE,A.LATITUDE,A.EXPIRY_DATE,A.OPERATE_STATE FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_SUBSTATION_B AS A LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_ORG_DCC_B AS B ON A.DCC_ID=B.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_SUBSTATION_S AS C ON A.ID=C.ID AND C.VOLTAGE_TYPE=9999 AND C.STATE_CODE=1003 LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PWRGRID_B AS D ON A.PG_ID=D.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE AS E ON A.TOP_AC_VOLTAGE_TYPE=E.CODE WHERE A.TYPE IN ({0}) AND A.TOP_AC_VOLTAGE_TYPE IN ({1}) UNION ALL SELECT A.ID,A.NAME,E.NAME,C.transformation_capacity,D.ID,D.NAME,B.ID,B.NAME_ABBREVIATION,A.OPERATE_DATE,A.LONGITUDE,A.LATITUDE,A.EXPIRY_DATE,A.OPERATE_STATE FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_CONVERSUBSTATION_B AS A LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_ORG_DCC_B AS B ON A.DCC_ID=B.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_CONVERSUBSTATION_S AS C ON A.ID=C.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PWRGRID_B AS D ON A.PG_ID=D.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE AS E ON A.DC_VOLTAGE_TYPE=E.CODE WHERE A.TYPE IN ({0}) AND A.DC_VOLTAGE_TYPE IN ({1}) ) ST ORDER BY CAPACITY DESC
ROOT.GetAllStationList: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.ID,A.NAME AS STNAME,E.NAME,C.transformation_capacity AS CAPACITY,D.ID,D.NAME,B.ID,B.NAME_ABBREVIATION,A.OPERATE_DATE,A.LONGITUDE,A.LATITUDE,A.EXPIRY_DATE,A.OPERATE_STATE FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_SUBSTATION_B AS A LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_ORG_DCC_B AS B ON A.DCC_ID=B.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_SUBSTATION_S AS C ON A.ID=C.ID AND C.VOLTAGE_TYPE=9999 AND C.STATE_CODE=1003 LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PWRGRID_B AS D ON A.PG_ID=D.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE AS E ON A.TOP_AC_VOLTAGE_TYPE=E.CODE UNION ALL SELECT A.ID,A.NAME,E.NAME,C.transformation_capacity,D.ID,D.NAME,B.ID,B.NAME_ABBREVIATION,A.OPERATE_DATE,A.LONGITUDE,A.LATITUDE,A.EXPIRY_DATE,A.OPERATE_STATE FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_CONVERSUBSTATION_B AS A LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_ORG_DCC_B AS B ON A.DCC_ID=B.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_CONVERSUBSTATION_S AS C ON A.ID=C.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PWRGRID_B AS D ON A.PG_ID=D.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE AS E ON A.DC_VOLTAGE_TYPE=E.CODE ) ST ORDER BY CAPACITY DESC
